title: Didn't get a free win in promos
body:
Hello , 2 days ago i went into promos , lost 2 win 1 .... and it should be 100% for me a free win next promo . Yesterday i tried to get back in promos (didnt succesed . i countinously stayed in plat 5 (didn't demote) , and today (now more exactly) i get again into promos , and i didn't get the free win ... 

Can someone explain me why and check my account ?

replies.body: Promo helper is limited up to a specific rank.  Per the ranked play guide, Promo Helper only sticks around up to Gold I.  Anything after including Platinum is not promo eligible.  Still, congrats on your promotion and hope that help clear things up!
